name: Bio F.R.E.A.K.S.
description:
Bio F.R.E.A.K.S. is an arcade-fighting game developed by Midway Games, Saffire and Saffire Association. It came out on 01-01-1998. Midway Games published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Bio F.R.E.A.K.S. on PlayStation, Nintendo 64 and PC.
Michael Gollieb produced the game. Dave Simon directed the game. Aubrey Hodges scored the game.
